Plot: The film tells the story of a highly-gifted boy whose parents have demanding and ambitious plans for him - they want him to become a pianist. However, one day the boy, Vitus, is no longer ...
Title: Vitus
Writer: Peter Luisi, Fredi M. Murer, Lukas B. Suter
Actors: Fabrizio Borsani, Teo Gheorghiu, Julika Jenkins, Urs Jucker
tomatoConsensus: Though not highly original, Vitus is slightly redeemed by its charm and compelling performances.
